function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistent sterilization temperatures and fluctuation ranges may compromise the effectiveness of high temperature steam disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low volume reduction rate and generation of toxic volatile organic compounds during high temperature steam disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for inadequate disinfection due to lack of control over the inactivation process and moisture content","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of conventional microwave units leading to ineffective disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential environmental pollution and health risks due to improper disposal of biohazardous wastes and toxic residues after disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious microorganisms surviving plasma incineration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor treatment of hospital wastes with chemical disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective physical disinfection using microwave technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete combustion due to excess air demand","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High investment costs for small and medium scale equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complicated maintenance and high maintenance costs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection with uvc due to inadequate depth of penetration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate selection of disinfection technologies for hospital waste","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risks of ozone disinfection in wastewater treatment, including high operation costs and hazardous byproducts with chemical reactions. ozone over-dose can cause bad smell and secondary pollution.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risks of using uv light in disinfection, including human exposure to hazardous uv radiation and incomplete disinfection of wastewater.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant preparation may result in high energy consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant has strong corrosiveness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant poses a risk of higher pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficiency or ineffectiveness of chlorine dioxide as a disinfectant","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chemical exposure and health risks from chlorine dioxide","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine in wastewater treatment system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of chlorine disinfection equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of chlorine levels in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic studies on disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewaters during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of wastewater treatment and general waste disposal measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious hospital wastes and wastewater could cause serious risks to public health and the environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission routes of sars-cov-2 include droplet, contact, and possibly airborne transmission in specific circumstances and settings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation or incorrect data through the kg","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate representation of covid-19 topics in the kg","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited engagement and utilization of openkg-covid19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Openkg-covid19 not being updated daily","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small number of samples for property evaluation in openkg-covid19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of contagious diseases through knowledge sharing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation leading to incorrect treatment and drug development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction of unknown side effects leading to unforeseen health risks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manually evaluated data quality and interlinking may lead to errors in the openkg-covid19 data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Volunteers committing data corrections may introduce incorrect information into the kg.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of blockchain technology for provenance tracking and credit incentive may pose security and privacy performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High error rate in kgs, with mistakes in entity and relation matching","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited schema overlaps and entity matches between kgs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Duplicated entities in entire data set without sufficient confidence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
